creator: Creator
app_locale_warning: Community addons and enhancements are managed by their respective developers, and these may appear in their original language.
media_item_delete_confirmation: This will clear this item from history. Are you sure you want to do this?
dictionaries_delete_confirmation: Deleting a dictionary will also clear all dictionary results from history. Are you sure you want to do this?
mappings_delete_confirmation: This profile will be deleted. Are you sure you want to do this?
catalog_delete_confirmation: This catalog will be deleted. Are you sure you want to do this?
import_duplicate: A dictionary with the name『$name』is already imported.
dialog_content_dictionary_clear: Wiping the dictionary database will also clear all search results in history.
dialog_content_dictionary_delete: Deleting a single dictionary may take longer than clearing the entire dictionary database. This will also clear all search results in history.
legalese:
A full-featured immersion language learning suite for mobile.

Originally built for the Japanese language learning community by Leo Rafael Orpilla. Logo by suzy and Aaron Marbella.

jidoujisho is free and open source software. See the project repository for a comprehensive list of other licenses and attribution notices. Enjoying the application? Help out by providing feedback, making a donation, reporting issues or contributing improvements on GitHub.
import_file_extension_invalid: This format expects files with the following extensions: $extensions
model_to_map: Card type to use for new profile
error_profile_name_content: A profile with this name already exists or is not valid and cannot be saved.
error_ankidroid_api_content:
There was an issue communicating with AnkiDroid.

Ensure that the AnkiDroid background service is active and all relevant app permissions are granted in order to continue.
info_standard_model_content:
『jidoujisho Yuuna』 has been added to AnkiDroid as a new card type.

Setups making use of a different card type or field order may be used by adding a new export profile.
error_model_missing_content:
The corresponding card type of the currently selected profile is missing.

The profile will be deleted, and the standard profile has now been selected in its place.
error_model_changed_content:
The number of fields of the card type corresponding to the selected profile has changed.

The fields of the currently selected profile have been reset and will require reconfiguration.
info_enhancements: Enhancements enable the automation of field editing prior to card creation. Pick a slot on the right of a field to allow use of an enhancement. Up to five right slots may be utilised for each field. The enhancement in the left slot of a field will be automatically applied in instant card creation or upon launch of the Card Creator.
info_actions: Quick actions allow for instant card creation and other automations to be used on dictionary search results. Actions can be assigned via the slots below. Up to six slots may be utilised.
no_more_available_enhancements: No more available enhancements for this field
stash_added_multiple: Multiple items have been added to the Stash.
stash_clear_description: All contents will be cleared. Are you sure?
stash_nothing_to_pop: No items to be popped from the Stash.
failed_online_service: Failed to communicate with online service
clear_dictionary_description: This will clear all dictionary results from history. Are you sure?
clear_search_description: This will clear all search terms for this history. Are you sure?
clear_creator_description: This will clear all fields. Are you sure?
info_fields: Fields are pre-filled based on the term selected on instant export or prior to opening the Card Creator. In order to include a field for card export, it must be enabled below as well as mapped in the current selected export profile. Enabled fields may also be collapsed below in order to reduce clutter during editing. Use the Clear button on the top-right of the Card Creator in order to wipe these hidden fields quickly when manually editing a card.
add_field_hint: Assign a field to this row
field_fallback_used: The $field field used $secondField as its fallback search term.
info_incognito_on: Incognito mode on. Dictionary, media and search history will not be tracked.
info_incognito_off: Incognito mode off. Dictionary, media and search history will be tracked.
exit_media_description: This will return you to the main menu. Are you sure?
clear_browser_description: This will clear all browsing data used in media sources that use web content. Are you sure?
ttu_no_books_added: No books added to ッツ Ebook Reader
local_media_directory_empty: Directory has no folders or video
player_option_drag_to_select: Use Drag to Select Subtitle Selection
player_option_tap_to_select: Use Tap to Select Subtitle Selection
player_option_blur_options: Set Blur Widget Color and Bluriness
player_option_blur_reset: Reset Blur Widget Size and Position
no_current_media: Play or refresh media for lyrics
wrap_image_audio: Include image/audio HTML tags on export
clear_text_description: This will clear all received text. Are you sure?
close_connection_description: This will end the WebSocket connection and clear all received text. Are you sure?
close_on_export_on: The Card Creator will now automatically close upon card export.
close_on_export_off: The Card Creator will no longer close upon card export.
export_profile_empty: Your export profile has no set fields and requires configuration.
error_export_media_ankidroid: There was an error in exporting media to AnkiDroid.
error_add_note: There was an error in adding a note to AnkiDroid.
first_time_setup_description: Welcome to jidoujisho! Set your target language and a default profile will be tailored for you. You can change this later at anytime.
use_br_tags: Use line break tag instead of newline on export
storage_permissions: Please grant the following permissions for exporting to AnkiDroid.
network_subtitles_warning: Embedded subtitles are unsupported for network streams.
accessibility: Permission is required to capture text from accessibility events.
clear_message_description: This will clear all messages and start a new chat. Are you sure?
error_chatgpt_response: Request failed or rate-limited. Try again shortly or check your usage limits.
duplicate_catalog: A catalog with this URL already exists.
invalid_mokuro_file: File is not a Mokuro generated HTML file.
field_locked: $field locked and will not clear on export while Creator is active.
field_unlocked: $field unlocked and will clear on export.
processing_embedded_subtitles: Embedded subtitles are processing. Try again later.
structured_content_first: $i definitions are unsupported and were omitted.
structured_content_second: Consider a non-structured content version of this dictionary.
chatgpt_error: There was an error in getting a response from ChatGPT.
server_port_in_use: Local server port already in use
